column4: i'm using ubuntu 11.04. how can I install the mplayer plugin for firefox? there is no mozilla-mplayer package. (also, on chromium). i'm currently using totem plugin
I think the package for that is gecko-mediaplayer
it's in the same package (see the package description for the list of supported browsers)
well that documentation is community-maintained, so when you see a page that's outdated you can update it ;)
you're right, but any user that sees this just sees it's from help.ubuntu.com (therefore seemingly official), but is also really outdated
